00099         struct ScriptState
00100         {
00101                 // Index into CodeRecord::byteCode
00102                 uint16 curInstruction;
00103 
00104                 // Index into stack
00105                 uint16 stackHead;
00106 
00107                 // Stack.  BS_SCRIPT_STACK_SIZE is defined in bsConfig.h
00108                 bstype stack[BS_SCRIPT_STACK_SIZE];
00109 
00110                 // Time to wait when the script is suspended
00111                 bstype suspendTime;                             
00112 
00113                 // Local variables for whichever is the current emitter state.
00114                 // ScriptState itself is not responsible for managing this.
00115                 bstype* locals;                                 
00116 
00117                 // Constructor
00118                 ScriptState();
00119         };

00121         // Instance classes
00122         struct _BSAPI ScriptRecord
00123         {
00124                 // Member variables of the object that owns this ScriptRecord.
00125                 // Todo: in a poor example of RAII, this is allocated by <Object>Definition::createScriptRecord,
00126                 // and deallocated in ~ScriptRecord, which is called by <Object>::onRelease
00127                 bstype* members;
00128 
00129                 // Index into owning object's state list.
00130                 int curState;
00131 
00132                 // Script state for virtual machine.
00133                 ScriptState scriptState;                
00134 
00135                 // Constructor
00136                 explicit ScriptRecord(int numLocals);
00137                 
00138                 // Destructor
00139                 ~ScriptRecord();
00140         };
